title:
A multiplicity result for Hamiltonian systems with mixed periodic-type
  and Neumann-type boundary conditions
abstract:
We investigate the multiplicity of solutions for a Hamiltonian system
coupling two systems associated with mixed boundary conditions. Corresponding
to the first system, we impose periodic boundary conditions and assume the
twist assumption commonly used for the Poincar\'e--Birkhoff theorem, while for
the second one, we consider a two-point boundary conditions of Neumann type.
